story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_0100:
There are so many Pokémon spiraling out of
control without their Trainers!
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_0300:
Based on the timing of these events, I’d say that’s
probably a yes.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_0700:
Those Pokémon started rampaging all of a sudden!
And they’re not listening to their Trainers!
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_0800:
Right now, Agatha and Bruno are spearheading
the efforts to calm them down...
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_0900:
But my equipment suddenly started picking up
a strong psychic energy signal! I’m sure that’s
what’s causing this!
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_1000:
Psychic energy?! So what we guessed
was spot-on!
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_1100:
You seem to know something about this. Would
you mind telling me what happened?
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_1200: I see... So that’s what it was.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_1300:
The data Giovanni stole from me was research
that was still under development.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_1400:
We were trying to work out some of the problems
it could cause... Specifically, the risk of drawing
out too much power from a Pokémon.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_1500:
Giovanni must be using it for his evil plans. That’s
why Mewtwo is rampaging and can’t control its
psychic powers.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_1600:
And that’s causing all of these Pokémon to
lose control!
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_1700: But isn’t it odd that our Pokémon seem to be fine?
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_1800:
Hmm... I’m not 100 percent sure of this,
but I imagine...
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_1900:
the strength of the bond between a Pokémon and
their Trainer must be a factor in how strongly
they’re affected by this power.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_2000:
It looks like the only way to stop this chaos is to
calm Mewtwo down.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_2100: Is this...the price they’re paying for that power?
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_2300:
I can’t believe a guy like Giovanni has so many
followers, even when he does such awful things!
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_2400:
When I see how he’s able to manipulate so many
people within Team Rocket...
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_2500:
it makes me wonder why he can’t use his charisma
for the sake of good instead.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_2600: It’s a bit of a shame, really.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_2800:
Let’s split into two groups from here. Erika and I
will go after Mewtwo.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_2900:
The three of you should stay here and help the
others take care of all those Pokémon that are
out of control.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_3100: H-hold on! Take me with you!
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_3200: It’s dangerous. Mewtwo’s strong, you know.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_3300:
Is there a reason why you’re so set on coming
with us?
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_3400: I just... I want to see this through.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_3500:
And Rockruff isn’t affected by all this psychic
power! We won’t get in your way—we can
protect ourselves!
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_3800:
Well, it is going to be a tough battle, so it might
be a good idea to bring him with us.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_3900:
Also, it looks like you’d follow us anyway, even if
we said no!
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_4100:
But you have to make sure you’re always with
us, OK?
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_4300:
Will you come with us, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Lillie?
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_0401_4500: Thank you! Then let’s stay as a team.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_0402_4700:
Thank you. It’s always reassuring to have you
three around.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_4800:
Why don’t we heal up at the Pokémon Center and
leave right after that?
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_4900: Hm... D’you think he’ll really be OK?
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_5000:
With that serious personality of his, I’m worried
that Paulo’s putting too much pressure
on himself. It’s not healthy...
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_5200:
But sometimes, words just aren’t enough to
convince someone who has already made up
their mind.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_5300:
And at times, you have to let them experience
hardship themselves in order for them to learn
from it.
story_teamrocket_01_21000/2401_1201_5400:
You might look the gentle type, but sometimes, you
can be pretty tough, Erika.
